縦横無礙: (じゅうおうむげ) - (yoji) being as free as the air; active without any restraint
縦横自在: (じゅうおうじざい) - (yoji) freely; right and left; active without any restraint; with unrestricted energy in all directions
縦社会: (たてしゃかい) - vertically structured society
縦笛: (たてぶえ) - end-blown flute (esp. the recorder)
縦結び: (たてむすび) - vertical or granny knot
縦線: (たてせん) - vertical line; bar line (e.g. in music)
縦縞: (たてじま) - vertical stripes; striped fabric
縦縞巾着鯛: (タテジマキンチャクダイ) - emperor angelfish (Pomacanthus imperator)
縦読み: (たてよみ) - reading vertically down horizontal text (e.g. as a simple code)
縦走: (じゅうそう) - traverse; walk along the ridge
縦軸: (じゅうじく) - vertical axis/vertical line; vertical shaft/spindle; connection between past and present
縦長: (tatenaga) - oblong, vertical writing style (por exemplo, em envelopes), portrait orientation
縫いぐるみ: (ぬいぐるみ) - stuffed toy; plush toy; plush toys; soft toy; cuddly toy
縫いなおす: (ぬいなおす) - to resew; to remake
縫い代: (ぬいしろ) - margin for a seam; seam allowance
縫い代のしまつ: (ぬいしろのしまつ) - inside stitched edge of inverted seam; rough stitch
縫い代を割る: (ぬいしろをわる) - to stop an inside seam rolling about; to press open a seam (and open the left and right sides out)
縫い包み: (ぬいぐるみ) - stuffed toy; plush toy; plush toys; soft toy; cuddly toy
縫い合せる: (ぬいあわせる) - to sew up; to sew together
縫い合わせる: (ぬいあわせる) - to sew up; to sew together
縫い直す: (ぬいなおす) - to resew; to remake
縫い箔: (ぬいはく) - embroidery and foil or gilt
縫う: (ぬう) - to sew/to stitch; to weave one's way (e.g. through a crowd)
縫合せる: (ぬいあわせる) - to sew up; to sew together
縫合わせる: (ぬいあわせる) - to sew up; to sew together
縫腋: (ほうえき) - stitched side of some traditional Japanese clothing/clothing with such a stitched side; robe with a round collar, stitched sides and a ran, worn by the emperor and high-ranking officials
縫腋の袍: (ほうえきのほう) - robe with a round collar, stitched sides and a ran, worn by the emperor and high-ranking officials
縮: (shuku/chiji) - shrink , wearing armour (armor); counter for suits of armour
縮かむ: (ちぢかむ) - to be benumbed (e.g. with cold); to shrink/to contract/to diminish (in size)
縮こまる: (ちぢこまる) - to curl oneself up; to squeeze oneself in; to be huddled
縮まる: (ちぢまる) - to shorten; to narrow; to close
縮みあがる: (ちぢみあがる) - to freeze (in fear, surprise, etc.)/to cower/to flinch; to shrink up/to shrink/to shrivel up
縮み上がる: (ちぢみあがる) - to freeze (in fear, surprise, etc.)/to cower/to flinch; to shrink up/to shrink/to shrivel up
縮み織り: (ちぢみおり) - cotton crepe; preshrunk cloth
縮む: (ちじむ) - to shrink; to contract; to diminish (in size)
縮める: (ちぢめる) - to shorten; to reduce; to boil down; to shrink
縮らす: (ちぢらす) - to curl; to crimp
縮らせる: (ちぢらせる) - to curl; to crimp
縮れ: (ちぢれ) - frizz; kink; crimp; curls (hair, noodles, leaves, etc.)
縮れる: (ちぢれる) - to be wavy; to be curled
縮れ毛: (ちぢれげ) - curly hair; kinky hair; frizzy hair
縮写: (しゅくしゃ) - reduced copy; reproduction in miniature
縮刷: (しゅくさつ) - pocket edition; small-type edition
縮刷版: (しゅくさつばん) - small edition; pocket edition
縮原発: (しゅくげんぱつ) - reducing dependence on nuclear energy
縮図: (しゅくず) - reduced drawing/miniature copy; microcosm/microcosmos
縮小命令セットコンピュータ: (しゅくしょうめいれいセットコンピュータ) - Reduced Instruction Set Computer (or Computing); RISC

縮毛矯正: (しゅくもうきょうせい) - hair straightening
縮瞳: (しゅくどう) - (ant: 散瞳) miosis; myosis; (excessive) constriction of the pupil
